title: Pork imports of selected countries worldwide 2020 , by country
yAxis: Import volume in thousand metric tones
summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Import volume in thousand metric tones in each Country on the y axis.
The Import volume in thousand metric tones is highest at Country China and lowest at Country Canada.
The difference of Import volume in thousand metric tones between the highest and lowest Country is 3440.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Import volume in thousand metric tones in the y axis.
The Import volume in thousand metric tones is appeared to be the highest at Country China and lowest at Country Canada.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Import volume in thousand metric tones in each Country on the y axis.
The Import volume in thousand metric tones is highest at Country China and lowest at Country Canada.
The difference of Import volume in thousand metric tones between the highest and lowest Country is 3440.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Import volume in thousand metric tones in the y axis.
The Import volume in thousand metric tones is appeared to be the highest at Country China and lowest at Country Canada.
The second highest Import volume in thousand metric tones is appeared to be the Country Others.
The highest Country China has 3440.0 more Import volume in thousand metric tones than the lowest Country Canada.
Import volume in thousand metric tones at Country China is 3700.0 , second place is Others at 1590.0, and thirdly is Japan at 1490.0.
Country Hong Kong, and Philippines have the same Import volume in thousand metric tones.
The highest value 3700.0 at China is almost 3.34 times larger than the average value 1107.89.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 9971.0.
